item.title: Every Single Retro
item.description: The outcome of almost every retro can be captured easily by this poster: Every Single Retro

item.title: The Velocity Conundrum
item.description: Near Chinatown street in Singapore Velocity! It’s a term that has potentially confounded, frustrated and perhaps amused Agile practitioners and customers alike at some point. It’s a concept that can be quite helpful though, when used accurately as a planning & estimation tool. Velocity is a measure of the number of story points delivered in an Iteration. The word delivered here means - dev & test complete, and ready for Production.
